settings.author_description: Garett Reid has worked professionally in the fitness industry for almost 15 years as a Strength & Conditioning Coach, gym owner, fitness consultant, lecturer, and educator. With almost 5 years of experience writing and producing content, Garett has hundreds of published articles on the topics of human performance, sports nutrition, and fitness. He holds his Masters in Exercise Science along with his NSCA CSCS and CISSN certifications and currently serves as Vice President of the NSCA Strongman SIG. With published papers in NSCA Coach as well as speaking at NSCA conferences, Garett's main passion is to take what he's learned through his career to help others simplify their fitness journey.
